comments.body: Does `networks_cli_compatible` need to be enabled for these checks ?

No, but `networks_cli_compatible: yes` will be the default eventually anyway (the default will switch in Ansible 2.12, right now you get a warning if you don't explicitly set it to `yes` or `no` when specifying `networks:`).
If there is no reason to not use the default value, i would remove this parameter.

All tests involving `networks:` which don't explicitly test with `networks_cli_compatible: no` use `networks_cli_compatible: yes`, which we recommend all users to use when they specify `networks:`. So I'd really prefer this test to also use the new codepaths and not the old ones corresponding to the old deprecated default value.
